table.name: invoice_summary
table.description: INVOICE_SUMMARY contains the summary of the INVOICE_LINEITEM and  INVOICE_SUMMARY_DETAIL tables.

columns.name: INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the invoice.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE
columns.description: The total freight charge for the invoice.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE_GID
columns.description: The freight charge GID.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE_BASE
columns.description: The total freight charge for the invoice in the base currency.

columns.name: PREPAID_AMOUNT
columns.description: The dollar amount already paid on the invoice.

columns.name: PREPAID_AMOUNT_GID
columns.description: The prepaid amount GID.

columns.name: PREPAID_AMOUNT_BASE
columns.description: Prepaid amount in base units.

columns.name: COMMERCIAL_UNIT_PRICE
columns.description: Commercial unit price.

columns.name: COMMERCIAL_UNIT_PRICE_GID
columns.description: The commercial unit price GID.

columns.name: COMMERCIAL_UNIT_PRICE_BASE
columns.description: Commercial unit price in base units.

columns.name: UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The number of units on the invoice.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the transport handling unit.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: The total weight of all items shipped on this invoice.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: The total volume of items shipped for this invoice.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Weight unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Volume unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Weight in base units.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: Volume in base units.

columns.name: WEIGHT_QUALIFIER
columns.description: Weight qualifier.

columns.name: INVOICE_TOTAL
columns.description: The count of the invoice's line items.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date to be used for any currency conversions; if null, the latest conversion should be used.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the set of exchange rates to use for currency conversions; if null, the default set should be used.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the freight charge.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The freight charge functional currency GID.

columns.name: PREPAID_AMOUNT_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the prepaid amount.

columns.name: PREPAID_AMOUNT_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The prepaid amount functional currency GID.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: INVOICE_SERVICE_CODE_GID
columns.description: The type of service that was performed. Foreign key to INVOICE_SERVICE_CODE. Summary level charges on invoice for service level. This is generally for air and ground.

columns.name: INVOICE_SUMMARY_SEQ_NO
columns.description: Sequence number for the invoice summary.
